description: With Hassan Nasrallah dead in Israeli airstrikes, the Iran-backed militant group is facing enormous challenges as the region is yet again thrown into uncertainty.
title: Analysis: Hassan Nasrallah’s killing transforms an already deadly regional conflict

description: Under his leadership, Hezbollah, funded by Iran, became one of the most powerful militias in the Middle East, boasting a military force stronger even than the Lebanese army.
title: Who was Hassan Nasrallah, the Hezbollah leader killed by Israel?

description: “Every movie I make involves passion,” writer and director Francis Ford Coppola says. “The Godfather is very classical. Apocalypse Now is very wild.” His latest, Megalopolis, is a Roman epic – set in New Rome, a futuristic New York City.
title: ‘The movie tells you how to make it’: After decades, Coppola’s ‘Megalopolis’ is here

description: This time next year, NASA plans to send its first crewed mission to the moon. NPR visited the facility to find out how the astronauts are preparing for this high stakes exploration.
title: Meet the astronauts preparing to travel farther from Earth than any human before

description: On surprising new albums, '80s trailblazers LL Cool J and MC Lyte sound thrillingly revitalized, thanks to sharp production choices and a willingness to bend their signature styles toward the moment.
title: Golden-age rappers make a digital-age leap — and survive

description: Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah was said to be the target of the strikes, but it was not immediately clear if he was at the site when they happened.
title: Israel strikes Hezbollah in blast targeting the militant group's leader
